<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>TEST</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var chgID = current.sys_id;
	alert('JCD Change Number: '+current.number);
	var wrk = new GlideRecord ('x_0890_devops_work');
	wrk.addQuery('parent',chgID);
	wrk.query();
	while(wrk.next()){
		alert('JCD Work Number: '+wrk.number);
		var wrkID = wrk.sys_id;
		var objs = new GlideRecord ('x_0890_devops_work_objects');
		objs.addQuery('work',wrkID);
		objs.query();
		while (objs.next()){
			current.description = objs.object;
			alert('LOG THIS: '+obj.object);
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-10 19:28:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>712685512ffb50106282d49df699b60d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TEST</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="DevOps Management" source="x_0890_devops">96fe5ee02f3310106282d49df699b657</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DevOps Management">96fe5ee02f3310106282d49df699b657</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_712685512ffb50106282d49df699b60d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-10 19:36:07</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=712685512ffb50106282d49df699b60d"/></record_update>
